alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 5:09PM EST until December 30 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 600 PM EST. * At 508 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Cuthbert, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cuthbert, Dawson, Shellman, Walker, Sasser, Carnegie, Moye, Herod, Cordrays Mill, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Fountain Bridge, Goffs Mill, Shivers Mill, Aycock Mill, Martins Crossroads, Chickasawhatchee and Doverel. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
